item.title: HONORS & AWARDS
item.description: 2012 OIC Scholarship for undergraduate study, Islamic University of Technology. 2014 Champion, IUT Computer Programming Contest. 2014 Honorable Mention, Human Expedition on Mars Timeline 2018. 2016 2nd/100 in Inter University Programming Contest, Daffodill International University ACM ICPC world finals warmup contest 2016 2016 6th/100+ in Inter University Programming Contest, NSU Cybernauts National Programming Contest 2019 NTU Research Scholarship, Fully funded Ph.

item.title: What's wrong with LLM Evaluation?: Evaluation is Hard (& also Costly).
item.description: Language models are trained with millions of dollars, involving very intricate engineering jobs, as well as thousands of hours of manpower and human stresses. However, day by day, the evaluation of language models is becoming so confusing and cumbersome that it becomes almost impossible to confidently say which language model is better at what. In this article, I have tried to sketch out some of my observations and findings, provide some recipes, and conclude with a call for a more rigorous approach to language model evaluation.

item.title: Academic: the website designer for Hugo
